https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4sSDa1fTN93xhEuByWC7BoX4fd5.jpg A comical road movie about friendship and happiness with unique protagonists. Bomber is a small man. And he has just lost his job as a courier. He decides to rip off his boss and keep the money from his last delivery trip to Paris. Europe is a beautiful blind French girl living in Paris. When she finds out she is pregnant from a one-night stand, she decides to travel to Berlin to find the father. - MUBI Doll, The Fatso And Me
